body:
Seeing that I haven't done an AMA in awhile and I'm leaving I thought I would answer some of your guy's questions.

So ask away I'm ready

title: Leaving AMA

replies.body: how long have you been on avicus?

replies.body: I love getting to know aomeone before I never see them again :D Wonder why leaving amas never caught on?
